meaningMnemonic: The word 迷う means "to go astray" but this word is <vocabulary>to lead astray</vocabulary>. You are doing the astraying to someone or something else. You know this because the other person <reading>was</reading> (わす) just fine until you came along to lead them astray.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 迷う, so use that so you aren't lead astray too.
